label: Consuming and Transforming Data By Using Power BI Desktop

skills.label: Connect to data sources.
items: May include: connect to databases, files, folders
Connect to sql azure, big data, sql server analysis services (ssas)

skills.label: Perform transformations.
items: May include: design and implement basic and advanced transformations
Change data format to support visualization

skills.label: Create calculated columns, calculated tables, and measures.
items: May include: create dax formulas for calculated columns, calculated tables, and measures

skills.label: Measure performance by using KPIs, gauges and cards.
items: Use the format settings to manually set values

skills.label: Create hierarchies.
items: Create hierarchies based on business needs
Add columns to tables to support desired hierarchy

skills.label: Create and format interactive visualizations.
items: May include: select a visualization type
Handle categories that have no data
Configure default summarization and data category of columns
Use bookmarks and themes for reports

skills.label: Manage custom reporting solutions.
items: May include: configure and access microsoft power bi embedded
Enable developers to create and edit reports through custom applications
Enable developers to embed reports in applications
Use the power bi api to push data into a power bi dataset
Enable developers to create custom visuals

label: Configure Dashboards, Reports and Apps in the Power BI Service

skills.label: Access on-premises data.
items: May include: connect to a data source by using a data gateway
Publish reports to the power bi service from power bi desktop
Edit power bi service reports by using power bi desktop

skills.label: Configure a dashboard.
items: May include: add text and images

skills.label: Publish and embed reports.
items: Publish reports to a power bi report server

skills.label: Configure security for dashboards, reports and apps.
items: May include: create a security group by using the admin portal
Configure access to dashboards and app workspaces
Configure the export and sharing setting of the tenant

skills.label: Configure apps and apps workspaces.
items: May include: create and configure an app workspace
Package dashboards and reports as apps
